Contents.Content: select /*--zy.BRBH as PatientID, zy.ZYH as InPatientID, zy.XM as PatientName, zy.XB as PatientSex, zy.NL as PatientBirthday, zy.BQ as WardArea, zy.CH as BedNo, zy.SFZH as PatientIDCard--*/ * from ZYBRXX zy where 1=1 {0}

select --病人基本信息 zy.BRBH as VALUE,--病人编号 zy.BRBH as INPATIENTCODE,--病人编号 zy.XM as NAME, --病人姓名 zy.XM as DISPLAYNAME, --病人姓名 zy.XB as PATIENTSEX, --病人性别 zy.NL as PatientBirthday, --出生年月 --住院信息 zy.BQ as WARDAREA,--病区 zy.CH as BEDNO --床位 from MZBRXX zy where 1=1 {0}

select --手术信息 br.ZYH as VALUE,--病人编号 br.BRXM as NAME, --病人姓名 br.BRXM as DISPLAYNAME, --病人姓名 br.XB as PATIENTSEX, --病人性别 br.CSNY as PatientBirthday, --出生年月 year(getdate())-substring(CONVERT(nvarchar(30),zy.NL,112),1,4) as PATIENTAGE,--年龄 ss.SSBH as MEDICALRECORDCODE, --病案号 ss.SSKS as OPERATIONROOM, --手术室 ss.SQKS as OPERATIONDEPARTMENT, --科室 ss.SSRQ as OPERATIONDATE, --手术时间 ss.SSYS as OPERATIONDOCTOR, --手术医生 ss.SSMC as OPERATIONNAME --手术名称 from VI_ZS_ZYXX br left join VI_ZS_SSXX ss on br.ZYH=ss.ZYH where 1=1 {0}
select /*--zy.BRBH as PatientID, zy.MZH as InPatientID, zy.XM as PatientName, zy.XB as PatientSex, zy.NL as PatientBirthday, zy.SFZH as PatientIDCard--*/ * from MZBRXX zy where 1=1 {0}
select --病人基本信息 zy.BRBH as VALUE,--病人编号 zy.XM as NAME, --病人姓名 zy.XM as DISPLAYNAME, --病人姓名 zy.XB as PATIENTSEX, --病人性别 zy.NL as PatientBirthday --出生年月 from MZBRXX zy where 1=1 {0}
